City Hunter is a project developed at the University of Luxembourg for the course of Principles of Software Development.

Be the ultimate city hunter! The goal consists in resolving as many mysteries as possible across many different citites. To solve a given mystery, you must visit several checkpoints across the city and solve challenges. For each successful challenge you increase your score. If you successfully solve each of the challenges, then you are granted a hint which should help you get closer to solve the given mystery. Enough of talking, now go out there and solve some mysteries!
